welcome-to-dopamine: Welcome to Dopamine, we think you'll love it! First, let's set things up.
what-should-dopamine-look-like: What should your Dopamine look like?
let-us-set-up-collection: Let's now set up your collection. Where do you store your music?
please-consider-donating: If you like Dopamine, please consider donating. You can donate right now, or later in the 'About' screen. Thank you!
let-us-start-dopamine: All done. Let's now start up Dopamine!
no-folders-in-collection: There are no folders in your collection
use-system-title-bar: Use system title bar (requires a restart)
show-welcome-screen: Show the welcome screen on the next restart
donate-instructions: Do you like Dopamine? Please click here to donate. Thank you!
thanks-to-sharlee: To Sharlee, for his gorgeous icons!
thanks-to-developers: To the developers who created the components which we use.
thanks-to-neowin: To Neowin for their great ideas, testing and bug reports.
add-folders-with-your-music: Add folders containing your music to your collection
show-all-folders-in-the-collection: Show all folders in the collection
skip-previously-removed-files: Skip files which were previously removed from the collection
refresh-all-covers: Refresh covers for all albums, including those that already have a cover.
refresh-missing-covers: Refresh covers only for albums that have no cover yet
confirm-delete-folder-long: Are you sure you want to delete the folder '{{folderPath}}'?
delete-folder-error: An error occurred while deleting the folder. Please verify the log if you need more information.
get-folders-error: An error occurred while getting the folders. Please verify the log if you need more information.
add-folder-error: An error occurred while adding the folder. Please verify the log if you need more information.
global-error: An error has occurred which will cause the application to close. Please verify the log if you need more information.
create-playlist-folder-error: An error occurred while creating the playlist folder. Please verify the log if you need more information.
confirm-delete-playlist-folder-long: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist folder '{{playlistFolderName}}'? All its playlists will be lost.
delete-playlist-folder-error: An error occurred while deleting the playlist folder. Please verify the log if you need more information.
rename-playlist-folder-error: An error occurred while renaming the playlist folder. Please verify the log if you need more information.
confirm-delete-playlist-long: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist '{{playlistName}}'?
delete-playlist-error: An error occurred while deleting the playlist. Please verify the log if you need more information.
confirm-remove-from-playlist-long: Are you sure you want to remove these songs from the playlist?
remove-from-playlist-error: An error occurred while removing songs from the playlist. Please verify the log if you need more information.
online-preferences: Please tell us your online preferences.
show-icon-in-notification-area: Show an icon in the notification area (requires a restart)
confirm-delete-song: Are you sure you want to delete this song? You can restore it from the trash.
confirm-delete-songs: Are you sure you want to delete these songs? You can restore them from the trash.
delete-songs-error: An error occurred while deleting songs. Please verify the log if you need more information.
save-rating-error: An error occurred while saving the rating. Please verify the log if you need more information.
save-rating-to-audio-files: Save the rating to the audio files (MP3 only)
playlist-folder-is-empty: This playlist folder is empty. Don't forget to create some playlists.
title: Title
save-love-error: An error occurred while saving 'Love'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
